name: Void Bringer
description:
Play as a spawn of the void that siphons life around it.

Game entry of Drag & Plugin for the Quarter Annual DG Jam v2 of Driftwood Gaming and Tea.

Have fun playing it.

Credits : 

Game created by : Drag & Plugin

Tileset : Caz (Caz's Pixel Fantasy RMMZ RTP Tiles)
